privacy.title: Privacy Agreement
privacy.subtitle: Please carefully read the following privacy policy to understand how we collect and use your personal information
privacy.content:
Welcome to PomeloX application. We highly value your privacy rights. This privacy policy is designed to explain how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.

## Service Provider Information

**Service Provider (China):** Shanghai Grapefruit Smart Technology Co., Ltd.
**Overseas Collaborative Entity:** American Promotion Company, Inc. (as overseas collaborative partner)

## Information We Collect

To provide you with the best service experience, we need to collect the following personal information:

‚Ä¢ **Identity Information**: Legal name and Preferred name for identity verification and personalized services
‚Ä¢ **Contact Information**: Email address and phone number for account verification, important notifications, and security alerts
‚Ä¢ **Academic Information**: University affiliation for matching relevant activities and services
‚Ä¢ **Basic Profile**: Gender and other basic information for personalized recommendations
‚Ä¢ **Activity Information**: Activity registrations, check-in/check-out records, volunteer service records

## Purpose of Information Use

Your personal information will only be used for the following legitimate purposes:

‚Ä¢ Create and manage your user account
‚Ä¢ Provide activity registration and management services
‚Ä¢ Send important service notifications and security alerts
‚Ä¢ Improve our service quality and user experience
‚Ä¢ Ensure platform security and prevent fraudulent activities
‚Ä¢ AI Q&A and study abroad guidance services
‚Ä¢ Wellbeing Plan and volunteer coordination services

## Third-Party Services

To provide complete services, we may use the following third-party services:

‚Ä¢ **Gmail SMTP**: For sending verification emails and activity notifications
‚Ä¢ **Cloudflare R2**: For securely storing activity images and user avatars
‚Ä¢ **Firebase FCM**: For pushing important activity reminders
‚Ä¢ **Google OAuth**: Optional third-party login method

These service providers all follow strict data protection standards, and we do not provide them with personal information beyond what is necessary for the service.
privacy.data_usage_highlight: Your legal name, phone number, and email are only used for identity verification and necessary notifications. We promise not to use this sensitive information for marketing purposes or share it with third parties.
privacy.data_protection:
## Cross-border Data Transfer

To provide services, your personal information may be transferred to our overseas collaborative partner American Promotion Company, Inc. (USA). Transfer purposes include: service delivery, customer service/technical support, backup and security. We will take appropriate protective measures in accordance with the Personal Information Protection Law and other regulations.

## Data Protection Commitment

We use industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information:

‚Ä¢ All data transmission uses HTTPS encryption
‚Ä¢ Passwords are stored using secure hashing algorithms
‚Ä¢ Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
‚Ä¢ Strict access controls for internal personnel to personal information
‚Ä¢ Data encryption storage and access control

## Your Rights

Under relevant laws and regulations, you have the following rights regarding your personal information:

‚Ä¢ **Right to Know**: Understand personal information processing
‚Ä¢ **Right to Access**: View the personal information we have collected about you at any time
‚Ä¢ **Right to Rectification**: Correct inaccurate or outdated personal information
‚Ä¢ **Right to Erasure**: Request deletion of your personal information and account
‚Ä¢ **Right to Restrict Processing**: Limit how we process your information
‚Ä¢ **Right to Data Portability**: Obtain a copy of your personal information
‚Ä¢ **Right to Withdraw Consent**: Withdraw consent for personal information processing

## Data Retention

‚Ä¢ **Account Information**: Retained during your use of the service
‚Ä¢ **Activity Records**: Retained for 24 months for service improvement
‚Ä¢ **Transaction Records**: Retained according to legal requirements
‚Ä¢ **Deleted Data**: Permanently removed from all systems within 30 days

## Minor Protection

‚Ä¢ Users under 14 require explicit guardian consent
‚Ä¢ Appropriate protection for users aged 14-18
‚Ä¢ Stricter security measures implemented

## Contact Us

For any privacy-related questions, please contact us through:

‚Ä¢ **Customer Service/Technical**: info@americanpromotioncompany.com
‚Ä¢ **Legal/Compliance**: dev@americanpromotioncompany.com
‚Ä¢ Service Hours: Monday-Friday 9:00-18:00 (Beijing Time)

Continuing with registration indicates that you understand and agree to the above privacy policy terms.
privacy.please_scroll: Please scroll to read the full agreement
privacy.scroll_to_accept: Please read the full agreement first

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.full_content:
PomeloX Terms of Service & Privacy Policy (Combined Version)

Version: v1.1 | Effective Date: September 3, 2025

Contract Parties Information

Service Provider (China): Shanghai Grapefruit Smart Technology Co., Ltd.
Overseas Collaborative Entity (USA): American Promotion Company, Inc. (as overseas collaborative partner)

Part I: Terms of Service

1. Definitions and Scope

This platform refers to "PomeloX" and its operating entities, providing information and collaborative services, not directly providing police, medical, and public safety services. In case of emergency, please contact local emergency numbers (110/120/911).

2. Service Functions

‚Ä¢ AI Q&A: Study abroad guides, visa/course/housing information suggestions (for reference only)
‚Ä¢ Wellbeing Plan: Missing person emergency coordination, volunteer clue collection and liaison
‚Ä¢ Airport Pickup & Transportation: Free bus reservations, paid pickup/rideshare
‚Ä¢ Activity Management: Event publishing, registration management, check-in/check-out and QR code verification
‚Ä¢ Volunteer Management: Check-in/out, hour tracking and certification
‚Ä¢ Local Discounts: Merchant offers, points and redemption
‚Ä¢ Marketplace/Job Matching: Information posting and chat matching
‚Ä¢ Alumni Network: Email verification, trusted referrals

3. Registration and Eligibility

‚Ä¢ Must be at least 14 years old to register independently; those under 14 must have guardian representation
‚Ä¢ Provide truthful, accurate, and complete registration information
‚Ä¢ Hold valid school email or referral code
‚Ä¢ Properly safeguard account and password

4. User Conduct Standards

Prohibited Behaviors:
‚Ä¢ Publishing illegal, harmful, vulgar, defamatory, hateful, discriminatory content
‚Ä¢ Infringing on others' intellectual property, privacy rights, and other legitimate rights
‚Ä¢ Conducting reverse engineering, bulk crawling, malicious scanning
‚Ä¢ Unauthorized commercial promotion, mass advertising
‚Ä¢ Endangering activity venues, transportation safety, violating public security rules

Part II: Privacy Policy

1. Information Collection

Categories of Information Collected:
‚Ä¢ Account and Identity: Name/nickname, avatar, school email/phone number
‚Ä¢ Travel and Activities: Flight information, airport pickup reservations, activity registration records
‚Ä¢ Emergency and Coordination: Emergency contacts, missing person clues, volunteer liaison
‚Ä¢ Device and Logs: Device identifiers, IP, operation logs
‚Ä¢ Transactions and Payments: Orders, amounts, payment transaction numbers
‚Ä¢ User Content: Chats, comments, images/videos

2. Use Purposes

‚Ä¢ Create and manage user accounts
‚Ä¢ Provide activity registration and volunteer management services
‚Ä¢ Send important notifications and security alerts
‚Ä¢ AI Q&A and study abroad guidance services
‚Ä¢ Wellbeing Plan and volunteer coordination services
‚Ä¢ Improve service quality and user experience

3. Cross-border Transfer

Overseas Recipient: American Promotion Company, Inc. (as overseas collaborative partner, USA)
Transfer Purpose: Service delivery, customer service/technical support, backup and security
Compliance Measures: Take appropriate protective measures in accordance with Personal Information Protection Law and other regulations

4. Your Rights

‚Ä¢ Right to Know: Understand personal information processing
‚Ä¢ Access Right: View personal information we have collected about you
‚Ä¢ Rectification Right: Correct inaccurate personal information
‚Ä¢ Deletion Right: Request deletion of personal information and account
‚Ä¢ Restriction Right: Limit information processing methods
‚Ä¢ Data Portability Right: Obtain copy of personal information

5. Minor Protection

‚Ä¢ Users under 14 require explicit guardian consent
‚Ä¢ Appropriate protection for users aged 14-18
‚Ä¢ Stricter security measures implemented

6. Data Security

‚Ä¢ HTTPS encryption for data transmission
‚Ä¢ Secure hash algorithm password storage
‚Ä¢ Strict access control and permission management
‚Ä¢ Regular security audits and vulnerability detection
‚Ä¢ Data encryption storage and access control

Dispute Resolution

Users in China: Governed by Chinese law, with jurisdiction by competent people's courts
Users in the United States: Governed by state of residence or California law, disputes resolved through arbitration

Contact Us

‚Ä¢ Customer Service/Technical: info@americanpromotioncompany.com
‚Ä¢ Legal/Compliance: dev@americanpromotioncompany.com
‚Ä¢ Service Hours: Monday-Friday 9:00-18:00 (Beijing Time)

Thank you for choosing PomeloX

We are committed to providing a safe and reliable service platform for Chinese international students, strictly complying with laws and regulations to protect your legitimate rights.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.full_content:
PomeloX Terms of Service & Privacy Policy (Combined Version)

Version: v1.1 | Effective Date: September 3, 2025

Contract Parties Information

Service Provider (China): Shanghai Grapefruit Smart Technology Co., Ltd.
Overseas Collaborative Entity (USA): American Promotion Company, Inc. (as overseas collaborative partner)

Part I: Terms of Service

1. Definitions and Scope

This platform refers to "PomeloX" and its operating entities, providing information and collaborative services, not directly providing police, medical, and public safety services. In case of emergency, please contact local emergency numbers (110/120/911).

2. Service Functions

‚Ä¢ AI Q&A: Study abroad guides, visa/course/housing information suggestions (for reference only)
‚Ä¢ Wellbeing Plan: Missing person emergency coordination, volunteer clue collection and liaison
‚Ä¢ Airport Pickup & Transportation: Free bus reservations, paid pickup/rideshare
‚Ä¢ Activity Management: Event publishing, registration management, check-in/check-out and QR code verification
‚Ä¢ Volunteer Management: Check-in/out, hour tracking and certification
‚Ä¢ Local Discounts: Merchant offers, points and redemption
‚Ä¢ Marketplace/Job Matching: Information posting and chat matching
‚Ä¢ Alumni Network: Email verification, trusted referrals

3. Registration and Eligibility

‚Ä¢ Must be at least 14 years old to register independently; those under 14 must have guardian representation
‚Ä¢ Provide truthful, accurate, and complete registration information
‚Ä¢ Hold valid school email or referral code
‚Ä¢ Properly safeguard account and password

4. User Conduct Standards

Prohibited Behaviors:
‚Ä¢ Publishing illegal, harmful, vulgar, defamatory, hateful, discriminatory content
‚Ä¢ Infringing on others' intellectual property, privacy rights, and other legitimate rights
‚Ä¢ Conducting reverse engineering, bulk crawling, malicious scanning
‚Ä¢ Unauthorized commercial promotion, mass advertising
‚Ä¢ Endangering activity venues, transportation safety, violating public security rules

Part II: Privacy Policy

1. Information Collection

Categories of Information Collected:
‚Ä¢ Account and Identity: Name/nickname, avatar, school email/phone number
‚Ä¢ Travel and Activities: Flight information, airport pickup reservations, activity registration records
‚Ä¢ Emergency and Coordination: Emergency contacts, missing person clues, volunteer liaison
‚Ä¢ Device and Logs: Device identifiers, IP, operation logs
‚Ä¢ Transactions and Payments: Orders, amounts, payment transaction numbers
‚Ä¢ User Content: Chats, comments, images/videos

2. Use Purposes

‚Ä¢ Create and manage user accounts
‚Ä¢ Provide activity registration and volunteer management services
‚Ä¢ Send important notifications and security alerts
‚Ä¢ AI Q&A and study abroad guidance services
‚Ä¢ Wellbeing Plan and volunteer coordination services
‚Ä¢ Improve service quality and user experience

3. Cross-border Transfer

Overseas Recipient: American Promotion Company, Inc. (as overseas collaborative partner, USA)
Transfer Purpose: Service delivery, customer service/technical support, backup and security
Compliance Measures: Take appropriate protective measures in accordance with Personal Information Protection Law and other regulations

4. Your Rights

‚Ä¢ Right to Know: Understand personal information processing
‚Ä¢ Access Right: View personal information we have collected about you
‚Ä¢ Rectification Right: Correct inaccurate personal information
‚Ä¢ Deletion Right: Request deletion of personal information and account
‚Ä¢ Restriction Right: Limit information processing methods
‚Ä¢ Data Portability Right: Obtain copy of personal information

5. Minor Protection

‚Ä¢ Users under 14 require explicit guardian consent
‚Ä¢ Appropriate protection for users aged 14-18
‚Ä¢ Stricter security measures implemented

6. Data Security

‚Ä¢ HTTPS encryption for data transmission
‚Ä¢ Secure hash algorithm password storage
‚Ä¢ Strict access control and permission management
‚Ä¢ Regular security audits and vulnerability detection
‚Ä¢ Data encryption storage and access control

Dispute Resolution

Users in China: Governed by Chinese law, with jurisdiction by competent people's courts
Users in the United States: Governed by state of residence or California law, disputes resolved through arbitration

Contact Us

‚Ä¢ Customer Service/Technical: info@americanpromotioncompany.com
‚Ä¢ Legal/Compliance: dev@americanpromotioncompany.com
‚Ä¢ Service Hours: Monday-Friday 9:00-18:00 (Beijing Time)

Thank you for your trust

We are committed to providing safe and reliable services for Chinese international students and their families. Protecting your privacy is our responsibility and the foundation of building trust with you.
privacy.content_china:
PomeloX Privacy Policy (China Version)

Effective Date: September 3, 2025
Version: v1.1

Service Provider: Shanghai Grapefruit Smart Technology Co., Ltd.
Unified Social Credit Code: 91310112MAEQURTF0X
Registered Address: Room 513, 5th Floor, Building 13, No. 1955 Chunshen Road, Minhang District, Shanghai

1. Policy Overview

We strictly comply with the Personal Information Protection Law of the People's Republic of China, Cybersecurity Law, Data Security Law and other relevant laws and regulations, and process your personal information in accordance with the principles of legality, legitimacy, necessity and good faith.

2. Personal Information Collection

Account & Identity Information:
‚Ä¢ Name/nickname, avatar, school email/phone
‚Ä¢ School/grade/major, referral codes
‚Ä¢ Identity verification/email verification results

Activity & Travel Information:
‚Ä¢ Flight/arrival information, pickup reservations
‚Ä¢ Activity registrations, check-in/check-out, verification records

Volunteer Service Information:
‚Ä¢ Check-in/out records, hour tracking
‚Ä¢ Volunteer coordination feedback

Device & Log Information:
‚Ä¢ Device identifiers, IP addresses
‚Ä¢ Operation/security/crash logs
‚Ä¢ Cookie/local storage data

3. Purpose and Legal Basis for Personal Information Use

Based on your consent:
‚Ä¢ Account creation and management
‚Ä¢ AI Q&A services
‚Ä¢ Activity notifications and reminders

For contract performance:
‚Ä¢ Activity registration and volunteer management
‚Ä¢ Airport pickup and transportation services
‚Ä¢ Local discount services

For legal obligations:
‚Ä¢ Network security protection and risk monitoring
‚Ä¢ Cooperation with law enforcement investigations (as required by law)

For legitimate interests:
‚Ä¢ Service improvement and user experience
‚Ä¢ Fraud prevention and security

4. Personal Information Sharing and Processing Entrustment

Third-party service integration (only within necessary scope):
‚Ä¢ Gmail SMTP: Email delivery
‚Ä¢ Cloudflare R2: File and image storage
‚Ä¢ Firebase FCM: Push notification services

Cross-border transfer:
When transferring personal information to overseas collaborative partners (American Promotion Company, Inc.) for technical support, appropriate protective measures will be taken in accordance with PIPL, including signing standard contract clauses and conducting security assessments.

5. Your Personal Information Rights

‚Ä¢ Right to Know: Understand personal information processing
‚Ä¢ Right to Decide: Consent to or withdraw consent for personal information processing
‚Ä¢ Right to Access: View personal information we process
‚Ä¢ Right to Rectification: Correct inaccurate personal information
‚Ä¢ Right to Erasure: Request deletion of personal information
‚Ä¢ Right to Restrict Processing: Limit personal information processing methods
‚Ä¢ Right to Portability: Obtain copies of personal information

How to exercise your rights:
Send email to info@americanpromotioncompany.com or contact us through the app.

6. Protection of Minors' Personal Information

‚Ä¢ Under 14: Must obtain explicit guardian consent
‚Ä¢ 14-18: Appropriate protection, parental guidance recommended
‚Ä¢ Enhanced security technical and management measures

7. Personal Information Security Protection Measures

Technical measures:
‚Ä¢ AES-256 encryption for sensitive data
‚Ä¢ HTTPS encrypted transmission
‚Ä¢ Access control and authentication
‚Ä¢ 24-hour security monitoring

Management measures:
‚Ä¢ Minimum permission principle for employees
‚Ä¢ Regular security training and audits
‚Ä¢ Data access logging
‚Ä¢ Security incident emergency response

8. Personal Information Storage

‚Ä¢ Storage location: Primarily in mainland China
‚Ä¢ Retention period: Shortest time necessary for processing purposes
‚Ä¢ Overdue processing: Automatic deletion or anonymization

9. Contact Us

For personal information protection related questions:
‚Ä¢ Customer service: info@americanpromotioncompany.com
‚Ä¢ Data protection officer: dev@americanpromotioncompany.com
‚Ä¢ Service hours: Monday-Friday 9:00-18:00 (Beijing Time)
‚Ä¢ Address: Room 513, 5th Floor, Building 13, No. 1955 Chunshen Road, Minhang District, Shanghai

10. Policy Updates

If we need to modify this policy, we will notify you through in-app notifications, official website announcements, etc., and seek your consent for major changes.

This policy is governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China.
privacy.content_usa:
PomeloX Privacy Policy (USA Version)

Effective Date: September 3, 2025
Version: v1.1

Service Provider: American Promotion Company, Inc.
Address: 8988 CAMINITO FRESCO, LA JOLLA, CA 92037

1. Policy Overview

We comply with applicable US federal and state privacy laws, including the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA), and Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA).

2. Information We Collect

Personal Information:
‚Ä¢ Name/nickname, avatar, school email/phone
‚Ä¢ School/grade/major, referral codes
‚Ä¢ Identity verification results

Activity & Travel Information:
‚Ä¢ Flight/arrival information, pickup reservations
‚Ä¢ Activity registrations, check-in/check-out records

Volunteer Service Information:
‚Ä¢ Check-in/out records, hour tracking
‚Ä¢ Volunteer coordination feedback

Device & Usage Information:
‚Ä¢ Device identifiers, IP addresses
‚Ä¢ Operation/security/crash logs
‚Ä¢ Cookies/local storage data

3. How We Use Your Information

With Your Consent:
‚Ä¢ Account creation and management
‚Ä¢ AI Q&A services
‚Ä¢ Activity notifications and reminders

For Contract Performance:
‚Ä¢ Activity registration and volunteer management
‚Ä¢ Airport pickup and transportation services
‚Ä¢ Local discount services

For Legitimate Interests:
‚Ä¢ Service improvement and user experience
‚Ä¢ Fraud prevention and security
‚Ä¢ Technical support and maintenance

4. Information Sharing

Third-Party Services (limited scope):
‚Ä¢ Gmail SMTP: Email delivery
‚Ä¢ Cloudflare R2: File storage
‚Ä¢ Firebase FCM: Push notifications

We do not sell your personal information.

5. Your Privacy Rights

Under California Law (CCPA/CPRA):
‚Ä¢ Right to Know: What personal information we collect
‚Ä¢ Right to Access: Request copies of your personal information
‚Ä¢ Right to Delete: Request deletion of personal information
‚Ä¢ Right to Correct: Correct inaccurate personal information
‚Ä¢ Right to Opt-Out: Opt out of sale/sharing (we don't sell)
‚Ä¢ Right to Non-Discrimination: Equal service regardless of privacy choices

To exercise your rights:
Email us at info@americanpromotioncompany.com or contact us through the app.

6. Children's Privacy (COPPA Compliance)

‚Ä¢ Under 13: We do not knowingly collect information from children under 13
‚Ä¢ 13-17: Parental guidance recommended
‚Ä¢ Enhanced protection measures for minors

7. Data Security

Technical Safeguards:
‚Ä¢ AES-256 encryption for sensitive data
‚Ä¢ HTTPS encrypted transmission
‚Ä¢ Access controls and authentication
‚Ä¢ 24/7 security monitoring

Operational Safeguards:
‚Ä¢ Employee access on need-to-know basis
‚Ä¢ Regular security training and audits
‚Ä¢ Data access logging
‚Ä¢ Incident response procedures

8. Data Retention and Storage

‚Ä¢ Location: United States and other regions
‚Ä¢ Retention: Minimum time necessary for purposes
‚Ä¢ Disposal: Secure deletion or anonymization

9. Contact Us

For privacy-related questions:
‚Ä¢ Email: info@americanpromotioncompany.com
‚Ä¢ Data Protection Officer: dev@americanpromotioncompany.com
‚Ä¢ Address: 8988 CAMINITO FRESCO, LA JOLLA, CA 92037
‚Ä¢ Business Hours: Monday-Friday 9:00-18:00 (Beijing Time)

10. Policy Updates

We may update this policy and will notify you of material changes through in-app notifications, email, or website notices.

This policy is governed by applicable US law and the laws of California.
